title: 2018 Toyota Sienna and Yaris, Dodge Demon, French investigating diesel: What’s New @ The Car Connection
text: Report: Achieving the EPA's 2025 emissions goals could be 40 percent cheaper than expected If you follow car news at all, you know that U.S. president Donald Trump has announced a review of the auto emissions regulations approved by the Environmental Protection Agency during the final days of the Obama administration. Ford taking cloth upholstery...
